definitions: Traveling in a boat or ship for pleasure, typically stopping at various places.
Driving around aimlessly or for pleasure.
Moving at a constant, moderate speed.
Searching for a sexual partner, often in public places.
examples: They spent their vacation cruising the Caribbean.
He enjoys cruising around town on his motorcycle.
The plane was cruising at 30,000 feet.
He was cruising the bars looking for someone to talk to.
